member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.Name
member.summary: Column name.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.Position
member.summary: Column identification number.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.DefaultValue
member.summary: Default value of the column.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.DataType
member.summary: System-supplied data type.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.IsNullable
member.summary: Nullability of the column.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.MaxLength
member.summary: Maximum length, in characters, for binary data, character data, or text and image data. -1 for xml and large-value type data. Otherwise, NULL is returned.
member.remarks: For more information, see Data Types (Transact-SQL) (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms187752).

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.OctetLength
member.summary: Maximum length, in bytes, for binary data, character data, or text and image data. -1 for xml and large-value type data. Otherwise, NULL is returned.
member.remarks: For more information, see Data Types (Transact-SQL) (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms187752).

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.NumericPrecision
member.summary: Precision of approximate numeric data, exact numeric data, integer data, or monetary data. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.NumericPrecisionRadix
member.summary: Precision radix of approximate numeric data, exact numeric data, integer data, or monetary data. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.NumericScale
member.summary: Scale of approximate numeric data, exact numeric data, integer data, or monetary data. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Column.DateTimePrecision
member.summary: Subtype code for datetime and ISO interval data types. For other data types, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Collation.Catalog
member.summary: Always returns NULL. (for T-SQL)

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Collation.Schema
member.summary: Always returns NULL. (for T-SQL)

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Collation.Name
member.summary: Returns the unique name for the collation if the column is character data or text data type. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: T:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.InformationSchemaContext
member.summary: Allows inspecting the standard INFORMATION_SCHEMA views on supported databases through Entity Framework

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.CharacterSet.Catalog
member.summary: Returns master. This indicates the database in which the character set is located, if the column is character data or text data type. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.CharacterSet.Schema
member.summary: Always returns NULL. (for T-SQL)

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.CharacterSet.Name
member.summary: Returns the unique name for the character set if this column is character data or text data type. Otherwise, NULL is returned.

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Domain.Catalog
member.summary: Always returns NULL. (for T-SQL)

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Domain.Schema
member.summary: Always returns NULL. (for T-SQL)

member.name: P:System.Data.Entity.InformationSchema.Domain.Name
member.summary: Returns the unique name for the collation if the column is character data or text data type. Otherwise, NULL is returned.
